name: DM Lifetime Prediction
description: Predict lifetimes of DM candidate topologies using the H17 model.

hypothesis.H0: Predicted lifetimes for unassigned topologies are physically inconsistent with DM requirements.
hypothesis.H1: Specific high-crossing topologies show stability exceeding the age of the universe with FPR < 0.01.

data_requirements.description: KnotInfo data and H17 regression model results.

test_method: Extrapolation using H17 regression and bootstrap estimation of prediction intervals.
